original: 朝中群臣反對遷都，但董卓令軍隊搜捕城中富戶數千家，冠以「反臣逆黨」罪名，盡斬於城外，奪取其家產。
text: The court officials in the DPRK opposed the move to the capital, but Dong Zhuo ordered the army to search for thousands of wealthy families in the city and charged them with "rebelling against the ministers and the party". They all slashed outside the city and seized their property.
